title: Silkroad Online server emulator (prjVBEmu) + 1.44 working client
description:
This is a repack. 
The software is NOT created by me, just slightly modded and repacked. 
It contains the prjVBEmu server emulator and a fully working client, including private server patch (sremu patch)

english install instructions:
SRO emulator en cleint
0. unpack the downloaded rar.
1. unpack prjVBEmu.rar.
2. go to c:windowssystem32driversetc
3. make a backup of "hosts"
4. open "hosts" with notepad, and add the following lines:
	127.0.0.1 gwgt1.joymax.com 
	127.0.0.1 gwgt2.joymax.com
5. Go to the folder where you unpacked prjVBEmu.rar
6. Start prjVBEmu.exe
7. The server should now say "online"
8. copy the folder "Silkroad prjVBEmu" to "c:program files" where c: is your games/main disk.
9. start sro_client_sremu.exe, The game should load now.
10. Just log in as normal, with account admin and password test.

In the server window, under tools you can create accounts, add items, list monsters, etc.

If you want to play on the normal server just change the following lines:
	127.0.0.1 gwgt1.joymax.com 
	127.0.0.1 gwgt2.joymax.com
to this:
	#127.0.0.1 gwgt1.joymax.com 
	#127.0.0.1 gwgt2.joymax.com

To play on the private server again, just change it back.

FAQ:

Q: Why can nobody connect to my server?
A: The address 127.0.0.1 indicates the localhost. the server currently doesn&#039;t work online. I am trying to make it work, at least on LAN.

Q: Why are there no NPC&#039;s?
A: NPC&#039;s currently don&#039;t work. 

everything is scanned with the newest NOD32, and is clean.
